manufacturer: Mitsubishi Fuso Truck of America, Inc.

products.manufacturer: Mitsubishi Fuso Truck of America, Inc.

summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2019 MITSUBISHI FUSO FE140G. WHILE DRIVING AT ANY SPEED, THE VEHICLE DECELERATED WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO HK TRUCK CENTER (2624 HAMILTON BLVD A, SOUTH PLAINFIELD, NJ 07080, (908) 754-3330) WHERE THE ELECTRONIC CONTROL UNIT WAS REPLACED ON TWO DIFFERENT OCCASIONS. THE REPAIRS DID NOT CORRECT THE FAILURE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FAILURE OCCURRED ONLY WHEN THE WEATHER WAS HOT. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THAT THE ENGINE BLEW OUT TWICE ON TWO DIFFERENT OCCASIONS AND WAS REPLACED. THE DEALER COULD NOT DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE DECELERATION FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURES AND DID NOT ASSIST. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 200. THE VIN WAS INVALID.
